result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Irael L Alvarado

records.addlTxt: Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court.  Attorney William Hotchkiss in court for Irael L Alvarado.  Assistant District Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin.   Defense moved the court for an adjourned date for plea and sentencing.  Court denied request.  Defense counsel moved to withdraw, court denied request.  Court ordered case adjourned for plea hearing at 1:30, this same date.   mn

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court.  Attorney William Hotchkiss in court for Irael L Alvarado.  Prosecuting attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for the State of Wisconsin. . Doctor's report received and filed.  Parties reviewed report and do not contest findings.  Court found defendant competent to proceed and reinstated proceedings.  The Court quashed the imposed but stayed warrant issued on 8/31/22.  Case is adjourned in Br 45 for plea and sentencing.  mn

Defendant Irael L Alvarado not in court.  Attorney William Hotchkiss in court for Irael L Alvarado.  Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin.  The defendant has moved to Sheboygan and had difficulty with transportation.  The Courts' zoom is not available.  The Court will issue buy stay a warrant and scheduled this for a return on dr. report/calendar call  in Br 45.  mn
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in Court for Doctor's Report Return. Competency evaulation has been rescheduled. Court ordered defendant to be examined by the Wisconsin Forensic Unit with Dr Neiss on August 2, 2022, 8:00am room 504SB.  Court ordered case adjourned for doctor report return.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room 502 SB  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Irael L Alvarado via Zoom and in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Alicia H Kort for Erin Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defense counsel informs the court that they believe the defendant is not competent to proceed. Pursuant to Sec. 971.14(2) Wis. Stats., Court ordered defendant to be examined by the Wisconsin Forensic Unit with Dr Neiss on June 28, 2022, 9:30 room 504SB.  Court ordered case adjourned for doctor report return in Branch 34  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney William Hotchkiss out for medical reasons.  Erin Michelle Karshen for the State of Wisconsin.  Via email, status rescheduled to June 9, 2022, 9am via Zoom.  kmw  Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
both counsel in trial on 5.16.  Status rescheduled to May 24, 2022, 8:30 via Zoom.  kmw

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for status conference.  Defense is missing a piece of evidence. Case is heading to resolution posture. Case adjourned to Branch 34.  Status conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests more time to review case.  Case remains calendared in Branch 34.  Status conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am in Room 502SB.

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court with Attorney William Hotchkiss; both appear in person.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 34.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with A.V.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

Defendant Irael L Alvarado in court with attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Irael L Alvarado in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Irael L Alvarado appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, Branch 34.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
